data.title: Monuments Man
data.meta_description: Learn about tours and how all tours are customized to the specific personal interests of each group, family, or customer visiting the Nation’s Capital.
data.text:
The Cathedral Church of Saint Peter and Saint Paul, commonly known as Washington National Cathedral, features classical gothic architecture and is the second-largest cathedral in the country. With Jim as your guide, there’s no need to worry about special events that may impact on the scheduling of your tour. Tours are carefully planned around events and services so that you can take in all of the awe-inspiring scenery and sights the cathedral has to offer.

As an author in the midst of writing a book on Arlington National Cemetery, Jim is an ultimate specialist in leading your exploration of this most famous burial ground in the United States. History buffs will travel through time with an up-close-and-personal look at graves of notable figures such as presidents, explorers, Supreme Court Justices, politicians and diplomats, as well as leading military figures. Be sure to look out for Jim’s upcoming book, Sacred Space: Arlington National Cemetery.

With Jim, avoid the crowds and walk right into places that are notorious for long waiting lines. Jim knows how to navigate his way around Washington, D.C., such as the best time of day to see each site, tickets that may required, security requirements, and constantly changing hours of operation.

Get the inside scoop on some of D.C.’s most noteworthy government structures and experience his special access to buildings within the Federal Triangle. Check out hot spots like the Smithsonian Institution museums while minimizing waiting in long lines. A tour with Jim is completely customizable and geared towards providing you with the highest-level personalized D.C. experience.
